title: Substitute
text: Since we know $$d=420$$ and $$t=6$$, we can substitute $$420$$ for $$d$$ and $$6$$ for $$t$$ into the equation, which gives us $$240=6r$$.

title: Isolate
text: To isolate $$r$$, we can divide both sides by $$6$$.
